data.title: Southern European Music
data.meta_description: Flamenco Rythms - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document discusses the rhythmic structures of different flamenco styles. It explains that some styles like soleá and bulería have an established 12-beat rhythmic structure, while others are free-metered. It describes how the 12-beat compás developed and became fundamental to many flamenco styles. It also analyzes the accent patterns and rhythmic variations within styles like soleá, bulería and alegría.
